#summary &downarrow; character entity

You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesD D] > &downarrow;

== Value ==

There are 3 variations of this entity:

  * `&DownArrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2193/index.htm U+02193].
  * `&Downarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/21d3/index.htm U+021D3].
  * `&downarrow;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2193/index.htm U+02193].
